title: Small Epub Horror and Fiction Collection
description:
Ok, so here's my first torrent. 
I decided to upload my personal ebooks collection since I think it's good enough for some of you to enjoy. It's been made from lots of other collections, making up for about 700 books. The reading topics are mostly Horror and Fiction, though there are widely known Young Adult authors and even some historical books.
Most of the books are retails, or nicely organized ones. they are all in .epub format. 

Here's the list of authors: 

Andrzej Sapkowski, Fiction (The Witcher saga, most of them fan-made)
Anne Rice, Vampire Fiction (Everything)
Anthony Zuiker, Crime Fiction (Level 26)
Brandon Sanderson, Fiction (Mistborn series)
Bret Easton Ellis (Everything)
Brian Lumley, Vampire Fiction (Necroscope Series, missing Plague Bearer)
Cassandra Clare, Young Adult (all the important series)
Charlie Fletcher, Fiction (Stoneheart)
Chris Kuzneski, Crime Fiction (Payne & Jones series)
Clive Barker, Horror (almost everything)
Dan Brown, Fiction (everything)
Douglas Adams, Comic Fiction (Hitchhikers', Dirk Gently, some others)
Eoin Colfer, Fiction (Artemis Fowl)
ES Andrzej Sapkowski, Fiction (Saga de Geralt de Rivia, publicada por bibliopolis)
ES Stephen King, Horror (ColecciÃƒÂ³n en espaÃƒÂ±ol que he creado a traves del tiempo)
Fiction (few series like Percy Jackson's and Socket Greeny)
Heavy Reading, Just one for now: tobacco road
Hideyuki Kikuchi, Fiction (Vampire Hunter D series, published by black horse)
Historical (couple of historical books)
Horror (Collections I compiled, about 70 books)
Hugh Howey, Fiction (Wool and Shift series)
J. K. Rowling, Fiction (Harry potter's universe and casual vacancy)
J. R. R. Tolkien, Fiction (Books of him)
Jeff Lindsay, Serial Kilers :) (Dexter Series)
Joe Hill, Horror (his novels)
John Joseph Adams, Zombie (Couple of zombie books edited by him)
Joseph Delaney, Fiction (Spooks/ The Last Apprentice)
Marcel Proust, Classic
Michael McDowell, Horror (blackwater series)
Neal Stephenson, Fiction (most of his works)
Non-Fiction, only one for now
Orson Scott Card, Fiction (Ender series)
Peter Straub, Horror (most of his works)
Rhonda Byrne, SelfHelp (The secret series)
Robert J. Duperre, Fiction (The rift series)
SF Masterworks (Complete collection, 100 books)
Simon R. Green, Fiction (Deathstalker series)

STEPHEN KING
Took a shitton of time to get this one, about every single book I could get from him, mostly retail (where available), including Doctor Sleep. 76 books.

Suzanne Collins, Fiction (the hunger games)
V.C. Andrews, Horror (Most of the works under this name, up to 2012)
Veronica Roth, Fiction (divergent series)

ZOMBIES (mostly series)
As the world dies by Rhiannon Frater
Day by day apocalypse by J.L. Bourne
Deadlocked by A.R. Wise
Forest of Hands and Teeth by Carrie Ryan
Newsfles by Mira Grant

 
(where everything is put, means that I personally cracked my head looking for every possible title out there, and if it isn't there, I bid you good luck looking for it)

Notes:
1. As you can see, there are very different topics. To each its own.
2. This is a compilation from works I've found through the years here and there. Some of them aren't that easy to be found nowadays.
3. The seeding speed will be really shitty the first days, since my third-world connection isn't the best. I'll surely be seeding from 10am to 7pm, GMT-5.
4. Thanks for downloading
